entries.text: You lack the license for this DLC. Returning to title menu.

<?requiredDlcList?>
This profile cannot be loaded until the DLC is installed again.
DLC could not be loaded correctly. It cannot be used in the game.
New DLC was installed. Return to the title menu in order to use. Select "OK" to return to the title menu.
